OOC: I share that question about the shuttle.
   
  ::Zarak::
   
  Zarak: It's more likely that he felt going after his wife was a personal matter. he probably left the Maximals without telling them where he was going. He has always been very headstrong.
   
  OOC: For anyone who watched the Super Bowl last night. In the opening videos they were useing the track "Arrival To Earth" from the 07 TF Movie score.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
          
--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Hydras:
> 
> "PErceptor"siad Hydras by com link"Be ready for our arrival, we have 
> some injured bots and a guest that needs special care"Hissed Hydras 
> devilish enjoying while he imagined the Hot rod's suffering.
> 
> "Yes master"said Perceptor.
> 
> The male moved to the place where the shuttle would land

Myrmidon shifted position in his chair as he watched Hydras and the
others in the shuttle. He still fretted about the ease in which they
had captured Hot Rod, and the lack of other Autobots that had
accompanied him. 

Myrmidon sat back in his chair, "Perhaps the Maximals don't see this
Hot Rod as having any worth anymore, that they let him travel all the
way out here alone." Myrmidon shook his head as he looked ahead, ready
to return to base.

OOC: Is the shuttle in flight, or still on the ground? Didn't see a
post where they actually took off .. unless I missed it.
